did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Commercial Bank of Lake Erie letter book, 1816-1839.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Letter book of a Cleveland, Ohio bank contains copies of correspondence pertaining to banking transactions, relevant legislation, and finances of the state government.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Letter book of a Cleveland, Ohio bank contains copies of correspondence pertaining to banking transactions, relevant legislation, and finances of the state government.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Commercial Bank of Lake Erie. Letter Book, #1947. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
